bibl.title: Minor Textual Variants in Romans 16:7.
bibl.note: Introduction: Textual Variants and Non-Variants. - Junia / Junias: A Non-Variant in Romans 16:7. - Variant Readings in Romans 16:7. - Conclusion. - See in part. pp. 138-139: the text of P. Chester Beatty II Suppl. (= van Haelst 497; LDAB 3011).

bibl.title: Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies

bibl.seg: EPP Eldon J., Minor Textual Variants in Romans 16:7.

J.W. CHILDERS and D.C. PARKER (Edd.), Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies = Texts and Studies. Contributions to Biblical and Patristic Literature. Third Series. 4 (Piscataway, NJ, 2006) pp. 123-141.

Introduction: Textual Variants and Non-Variants. - Junia / Junias: A Non-Variant in Romans 16:7. - Variant Readings in Romans 16:7. - Conclusion. - See in part. pp. 138-139: the text of P. Chester Beatty II Suppl. (= van Haelst 497; LDAB 3011).
